function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Globalization as a driver of COVID-19 diffusion","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus to highly globalized nations with high human mobility","Mitigation":"Implement stricter international travel regulations and increased monitoring of international movement","Technologies":"Travel tracking systems, border control technologies","People":"Global travelers, countries with high human mobility","Owner":"Government authorities, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of social and geographic factors in COVID-19 diffusion","Impact":"Inability to effectively control the spread of COVID-19 based on social and geographic factors","Mitigation":"Conduct research to understand the convergence of social and geographic factors in COVID-19 diffusion","Technologies":"Epidemiological research, data analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inherent geographical processes in the spread of infectious diseases","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases across space and time","Mitigation":"Implement spatially targeted interventions and strict border control measures","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, geographical information systems (GIS)","People":"Populations at risk of infectious diseases diffusion","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"}]}
